data.author: Jens Bocklage

changelog.release_notes: Fix for saving user selected colors
Chose your own colors for drawing the QR Code and the background.

Added three color schemes for the color display Pebble.
More to come!
Now supporting Pebble Time and watchface configuration

Big update!
It shows time, date and day of week as QRCode!

- Supports English and German
- 12h and 24h mode
- Shows battery status
- Shows bluetooth status

The QRCode is calculated in real time!

NOW ADDED A CHEAT MODE!
Simply activated by the same guesture as turning on the backlight!
(psssst! It shows current time for 5 seconds!)

data.description: It shows time, date and day of week as QRCode! - Supports English and German - 12h and 24h mode - Shows battery status - Shows bluetooth status The QRCode is calculated in real time! NOW ADDED A CHEAT MODE! Simply activated by the same guesture as turning on the backlight! (psssst! It shows current time for 5 seconds!) Thanks to Kentaro Fukuchi for his QRCode lib! Check out my other watchfaces :)

latest_release.release_notes: Fix for saving user selected colors

data.title: QRWatch watchface - The good one!
